idea-plugin.name: DashStyle CSS Module Support
idea-plugin.description:
Enhances IntelliJ IDEA with better support for CSS Modules, specifically targeting string-key access like styles["foo-bar"].

Key features:

  • Code completion: Auto-complete class names from imported CSS Modules inside styles[" (in kebab-case), with the corresponding camelCase name shown next to each suggestion.
  • Navigation: Ctrl+click on "foo-bar" jumps directly to the matching .foo-bar ruleset in the CSS file, or to the fooBar property in a local object definition.
  • Smart quote handling: After completion, automatically inserts the matching closing quote and places the cursor inside the quotes.
  • Supports both imported CSS/SCSS/LESS files (CSS Modules) and locally defined JS/TS objects.

Ideal for React, Vue, or any project using CSS Modules — brings full IDE intelligence to kebab-case class names used in string literals.
